discovery.title: The Discovery
discovery.question: 🌍 The Question
discovery.questionText: In Rio de Janeiro, on October 16, 2024, a simple question arose: "When I have an idea here and now, where and when does it exist?"
discovery.mathText: This philosophical question led to a complete mathematical framework: knowledge as a dynamic field in space-time, governed by differential equations.
discovery.validationText: Tested with real data from COVID-19, Deep Learning, Bitcoin and Climate Change. Correlation >80% between predictions and observations.

framework.dissipationText: Loss of knowledge through forgetting, death, degradation of records.
